answers.answer: Congrats to you such a blessing she is nice and healthy! Why so early?
Aww congratulations!!!So happy to hear baby is healthy :)
Congrats! Hopefully she gains the weight fast so you can take her home :)
What happened I mean like what happened with your body how did you know you was in labor at that week im scared now im 30 weeks
Congratulations!
Congrats momma!
I'm glad she's ok! I'm curious to what happened. I'm 31 weeks and so afraid I'll go into labor early and not know it.
Wow that is amazing congrats in the string baby girl!!!
Congratulations!  I'm so happy your baby is doing good...best wishes to you!
Congrats, hopefully she's a hungry baby and you can go home and enjoy her soon! (:
What a blessing! She's healthy and strong! Amen! Congrats!

Thanks to all of you!!! I delivered because of complications with preeclampsia. I never went into labor. I was delivered by csection. For the mom who is nervous, don't be. I believe it was our time. Im sure your baby will come when god sees fit honey. not a second sooner
Congratulations
prayers your way, congrats
I am 28 wks and have a very good chance of having my baby girl early because I have a shortened cervix. I was wondering if a baby born that early is able to breastfeed? Congratulations on your baby!
Yay! I'm so happy for you and your little one!! As long as every one is happy and healthy that's what matters. :-) Hope she puts the weight on so you both get to go home together soon.

Normally a baby that early hasnt developed the suck swallow reflex to nurse..they have to be able to breathe and nurse at the same time. They have to learn that. Im currently pumping for my baby until her muscles are strong enough to nurse. You can text me if you like. 7575604046. Im tasha. My little one is not on the nicu. Just a Special care nursery
Congrats on healthy baby girl! Lots of early arrivals this year my friends baby came at 24 weeks she was as big as a dollar her dad said but she's doing well!
Congratulations!!
Congrats to you!!! And what a relief to hear that your baby is doing well considering she was born early!  Prayers for you and your family for the baby coming home soon

question: Just thought I'd share my happy news. Although unexpected, I delivered my baby girl last night at 1047. She was 2lbs and 7.2 oz. Breathing on her own. No problems and screaming her head off. hoping to bring this love bug home in a couple wks. She needs to gain two pounds.
title: delivered my baby at 31 wks 4 days
